Description.Text:
Please note: With an expansion planned between mid-September , 2012 and mid-2013, the magic of Disney will provide even more features to delight and enchant. Perfectly placed on a beautiful beachfront cove, Aulani resting on 21 acres with lushly detailed rooms and suites will offer kids, adults and families Hawaiian vacation experiences with a special magic that only Disney can create. Just close enough - and far enough - from Honolulu for Guests to enjoy the vibrancy of the island in every way imaginable, Aulani offers its own special enchantment with unique spaces and experiences created especially for families.

Every day of your Aulani stay promises a wonderful new story. You'll notice it the moment you arrive: Music fills the air. An unexpected glimmer of Hawaiian magic catches your eye. Every detail - from the soaring arches of the lobby to the tiniest carving in your room -- has a wonderful story to tell.

Day and night, Disney entertainment has been crafted with fun for every age - from Disney movies under the stars, sunset celebrations, fireside stories, lei making, hula lessons and more. Just steps from your room, mischievous waters await in the Waikohole Valley -- a beautiful winding waterway. The whimsical, wonderful, twisting slides of the Waikohole stream send you on a gushing, watery adventure. The vast Wailana pool welcomes families to the heart of it all with its beautiful infinite view, lapping waves and even private cabanas.

Every aspect of the Aulani experience is inspired by the culture, traditions and hospitality of the people of Hawai`i. Designed especially for families, there is something unique for everyone. Relaxing "me" time for adults. Imaginative fun for kids. Memory-making moments for the whole family.

Since the opening of Aulani, A Disney Resort & Spa in August 2011, Guests have enjoyed outstanding amenities and accommodations at this oceanfront Resort. And today, Disney continues to look for ways to enhance the vacation experience. As the Resort is expanded, rest assured, you can still anticipate a fun-filled vacation at Aulani during this period. Explore all the updates planned at Aulani.

Waikolohe Valley will soon delight Guests with more water features and dining options. During the pool area expansion, much of Waikolohe Valley will remain open-including Waikolohe Pool, the lazy river, slides, whirlpool spas, Rainbow Reef and Menehune Bridge. However, Makai Preserve will close permanently this fall; Wailana Pool (the quiet pool) and Wailana Bar will close for an extended period.

To accommodate more Guests, Starlit Hui will move to a larger venue. Be aware that Starlit Hui will close for approximately one month as it transitions to its new location.

Aulani will soon offer more accommodations for Guests. Upon completion in mid-2013, Aulani will feature additional rooms and Villas in 2 towers.

To provide shaded outdoor seating and accommodate additional Guests in inclement weather, an overhead trellis with retractable awnings will be added to the outdoor dining area at Makahiki. While enhancements are underway at Makahiki, restaurant operations will continue with interior seating only. As a result, the Disney Character Breakfast-Aunty's Breakfast Celebration at the Makahiki-will be extended to 6 days a week! This experience will be available Tuesday through Sunday, and Resort Guests will enjoy priority for advance reservations.

Exterior Finishing touches are being put on the building exteriors-including work on the decorative beam joints. While this work is in progress, you may notice some scaffolding and covered walkways at Aulani.

Mahalo (thank you). Your patience is greatly appreciated during this enhancement period.

Driving directions from Honolulu International Airport 1. Head east - 0.3 mi. 2. Take the ramp on the left to I-H-1 W - 0.3 mi 3. Keep left at the fork, follow signs for Interstate H1 W/Waianae and merge onto I-H-1 W - 17.1 mi 4. Continue onto Farrington Hwy/HI-93 W - 1.9 mi 5. Slight right at Ali`inui Drive - 1.6 mi

Deluxe Studio Island Gardens View - Island Gardens View: Includes at least a partial view of the mountains, spa or landscaping from the room or balcony. Room Description: 1 queen-size bed and 1 queen-size sleeper sofa; Flat-panel television and DVD player; Private porch or balcony; Deep soaking tub; Small refrigerator; Coffee maker and tea service; robes; Ceiling fan; Wireless Internet access; In-room safe; Iron and ironing board; Pack 'n Play playard.
Deluxe Studio Poolside Gardens View - Poolside Gardens View: Includes at least a partial view of the pool, courtyards, water features or landscaping from the room or balcony. Room Description: 1 queen-size bed and 1 queen-size sleeper sofa; Flat-panel television and DVD player; Private porch or balcony; Deep soaking tub; Small refrigerator; Coffee maker and tea service; robes; Ceiling fan; Wireless Internet access; In-room safe; Iron and ironing board; Pack 'n Play playard.
Deluxe Studio Standard View - Standard View: Includes either a view of the conference center, parking lot or parking garage from the room or balcony. Room Description: 1 queen-size bed and 1 queen-size sleeper sofa; Flat-panel television and DVD player; Private porch or balcony; Deep soaking tub; Small refrigerator; Coffee maker and tea service; robes; Ceiling fan; Wireless Internet access; In-room safe; Iron and ironing board; Pack 'n Play playard.
Deluxre Studio Oceanview - Ocean View: Includes at least a partial view of the ocean from the room or balcony. Room Description: 1 queen-size bed and 1 queen-size sleeper sofa; Flat-panel television and DVD player; Private porch or balcony; Deep soaking tub; Small refrigerator; Coffee maker and tea service; robes; Ceiling fan; Wireless Internet access; In-room safe; Iron and ironing board; Pack 'n Play playard.
